data.actual_result: Discord won't give you the option to add onto the existing reaction
data.expected_result: You're able to add onto the existing reaction
data.short_description: Unable to add to existing reactions when Reactions permission is denied
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a channel where you can't add reactions but someone else can - Have the other person add a reaction to a message - Try to add on to that reaction -
